title: BLACK+DECKER Crisp N Bake Air Fry 4-Slice Toaster Oven, Gray, TO1785SG
description: Deep fried taste without the fat! This oven features Air Fry Technology, which uses high intensity hot air to bake, brown, and crisp your favorite fried foods with little to no oil. Two control knobs simplify cooking, letting you set the 30-minute timer and choose from five cooking functions: Air Fry, Bake, Broil, Toast, and Keep Warm. On the toasting function, EvenToast Technology™ evenly distributes heat and infrared energy to optimize even toasting. The interior is large enough to fit up to four slices of bread or a 9” pizza, and it’s great for fresh or frozen snacks. Innovative features and reliable performance help make BLACK+DECKER the #1 brand in toaster ovens*. We stand behind our appliances with a 2-year limited warranty so you and your family can depend on them in your kitchen. *#1 Brand in Toaster Ovens in the USA—Source: NPD POS, unit sales, 12mo. Ending February 2019
